FuncDef: This command describes an alarm contact input pin. The description provides an indication of the usage or attribute of the pin. It is stored in the CLI configuration file and helps the user in identifying the purpose of the pin. The description is included in the log event when the pin changes state (the string "Pinx" is used in the log events if no description is configured).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a printable character string, up to 80 characters in length.
